body_html: @jinserk Look, I'd be more than happy to look into this, but the forum would be a much better place than a random bug report and you'd probably have much more success with "I have the following inputs and targets, warp_ctc does X, PyTorch CTC does Y, for me X is much better".
body_text: @jinserk Look, I'd be more than happy to look into this, but the forum would be a much better place than a random bug report and you'd probably have much more success with "I have the following inputs and targets, warp_ctc does X, PyTorch CTC does Y, for me X is much better".
body: @jinserk Look, I'd be more than happy to look into this, but the [forum](https://discuss.pytorch.org/) would be a much better place than a random bug report and you'd probably have much more success with "I have the following inputs and targets, warp_ctc does X, PyTorch CTC does Y, for me X is much better".
